export const Badge = (props) => <><span class={'badge badge--' + props.class}>{props.text}</span></>


List the nearest endpoints nodes from the client's IP

```graphql
nearestEndpoints: [Endpoint]
```


### Type

#### [`Endpoint`](/build/api/schema/objects/endpoint) <Badge class="secondary" text="object"/>
> [Endpoint] represents a network node's endpoint
>
